mdRecord.dcterms:title: You Know I Can't Hear You When the Water is Running by Robert Anderson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the comedy You Know I Can't Hear You When the Water is Running by Robert Anderson. Directed by John Going. Oct 10, 1972. 40th Season.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
